select t.parent_id parentId,
from hub_post p left join hub_post_diagram t on p.post_id = t.post_id where p.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and p.post_id = #{postId}

select u.user_id userId, u.user_name userName from hub_user u, hub_post p, hub_user_dept up where p.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and p.post_code = #{postCode} and p.post_id = up.post_id and up.user_id = u.user_id
select t.post_id id, t.parent_id pid, p.post_name as label from hub_post_diagram t left join hub_post p ON t.post_id = p.post_id where t.tenant_id = #{tenantId} order by t.parent_id, t.post_id
